special_text:
[+2]: Surtur deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three targets.
[-3]: Untap up to two target Mountains you control. They each become 4/4 Demon creatures with haste until end of turn.
[-9]: Target opponent gets an emblem with “Whenever a creature or planeswalker you control is dealt damage, this emblem deals 5 damage to you.”
